caption.p: Average trihalomethanes formation potential (THMFP) in ( a) treated (potable) water sampled from five Scottish water treatment plants before the point of disinfection, and their raw water, diluted to a dissolved organic carbon (DOC) content of ( b) 1 mg/L and ( c) 5 mg/L. Error bars indicate the standard errors (n = 5) for the average THMFP of water from the case study sites described in Table S1 in Supporting Information.
